basics.name: Vishakha Malhotra
basics.label: Data Scientist
basics.summary: Dentist turned Data Scientist with a passion for solving complex problems. I have a strong background in data analysis, machine learning, and deep learning. I am currently working as a Research Data Analyst 2 at the University of California, San Francisco. I have a Masters in Health Data Science and a Bachelor's in Dental Surgery. I am proficient in Python, R, SQL, and have experience with various machine learning libraries such as scikit-learn, TensorFlow, and Keras.

work.name: Bakar Computational Health Sciences, Gastroenterology
work.summary: Developed a high accuracy (90%) information extraction pipeline for identifying medications gastroenterologists prescribed medications for Inflammatory Bowel Disease.
highlights: Employed NLP techniques to clean, reformat and extract data from 13,000+ unstructured patient notes
Collaborated with a team of researchers and clinicians to develop a natural language processing pipeline to extract medication information from unstructured clinical notes

work.name: Dr. Gupta's Dental and Braces Clinic
work.position: Associate Dentist and Data Management Intern
work.summary: Provided dental care to patients and supervised dental assistants.
highlights: Performed dental procedures such as fillings, extractions, and root canals
Recorded and maintained patient data before and after comprehensive treatment using MS Excel.
Analyzed patient experience data and identified factors for improvement in the patient visit cycle.

work.name: Mahatma Gandhi Dental College and Hospital
work.summary: Provided dental care to patients and supervised dental assistants.
highlights: Performed dental procedures such as fillings, extractions, and root canals
Educated patients on oral hygiene and preventive care
Managed dental emergencies and referred patients to specialists when needed

volunteer.summary: Planning and hosting an in-person High School Outreach Conference to help high school students from underrepresented backgrounds learn more about the different health professional STEM professions.
highlights: Attended meetings and provided feedback on the curriculum and logistics of the conference
Helped with the planning and execution of the conference
Assisted with the recruitment of high school students to attend the conference
Conducted and volunteered activities during the conference

education.institution: Mahatma Gandhi Dental College and Hospital

publications.name: Zur Elektrody/namik bewegter Körper
publications.summary: It concerned an interpretation of the Michelson–Morley experiment and the properties of light and time. Special relativity incorporates the principle that the speed of light is the same for all inertial observers regardless of the state of motion of the source.

publications.name: Über einen die Erzeugung und Verwandlung des Lichtes betreffenden heuristischen Gesichtspunkt
publications.summary: In the second paper, he applied the quantum theory to light to explain the photoelectric effect. In particular, he used the idea of light quanta (photons) to explain experimental results, but stressed the importance of the experimental results. The importance of his work on the photoelectric effect earned him the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1921.

publications.name: Die Grundlage der allgemeinen Relativitätstheorie
publications.summary: The publication of the theory of general relativity made him internationally famous. He was professor of physics at the universities of Zurich (1909–1911) and Prague (1911–1912), before he returned to ETH Zurich (1912–1914).
